participant_1.background:
I love Halloween because I can wear my favorite comfortable clothes and collect as many toys as I want.
I have a lot of flexibility in my work schedule, which allows me to go to dance lessons with my boyfriend and recycle more.
I love to edit videos and spend time with my pug on rainy days.
I think it's important to be prepared for any situation, and that includes knowing how to defend yourself.
i like to ride horses.

participant_2.background:
I like bananas because they are a good source of potassium, which is important for muscle recovery.
on weekends i like to go hiking.
i have a harsh inner critic.
my country is russia.
I only speak one language, but I love watching action movies with my family on Netflix.

content.text: How is your day going?
It's going well. I just got back from hiking.
That sounds fun. I like to hike too. Where did you hike?
I hiked in the mountains near my home in Russia.
That's cool. I've never been to Russia.
You should come visit sometime. It's a beautiful country.
I would love to. I hear the food is amazing.
It is. I love Russian food.
What's your favorite Russian food?
I love borscht. It's a soup made with beets, cabbage, and potatoes.
That sounds delicious. I'll have to try it sometime.
You should. It's one of my favorite foods.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch action movies with my family on Netflix.
That sounds like fun. I love action movies too.
What are some of your favorite action movies?
I like the Fast and Furious movies.
Those are good movies. I like the Mission Impossible movies too.
Those are good movies too. I like the action scenes.
Me too. Action scenes are the best.
